snippet.title: PAGAN ONLINE - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Gods are gone. You're the only hope now. 
Prepare for a fight of pre-Biblical proportions! Join the Trials: https://www.pagan-online.com/

PAGAN ONLINE is an action hack-and-slash role-playing video game set in a fantasy universe. The world is inspired by pre-Christian mythology, and players can explore it alone or cooperatively. Developed in cooperation between Wargaming.net and Mad Head Games, the game will launch first for Windows PC.

For more info: 
🡆 https://www.pagan-online.com/
🡆 https://twitter.com/PaganOnline
🡆 https://www.facebook.com/PaganOnline
